q: " effort rather than a management shake up. "We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time," he said. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. Eric Schmidt has been chief executive of Google for some 10 years as the company built on its search business to become one of the largest tech firms and expand its business into web applications, services and mobility

and technology thought leadership-all of which are increasingly important given Google's global reach." Internally, Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin . In a statement, Eric Schmidt said: We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Eric Schmidt has clearly done an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade. The results speak for themselves. There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and

Tight integration between the OS and hardware could improve functionality. However, Microsoft has never been able to take advantage of its core developer group for mobile, so I don't see why this would help much. Android would be better for Nokia smartphones. book details the behind-the-scenes stories of Michael Vick 's surviving dogs and the influence, resilience, dedication and commitment of the animal behavior experts, animal-care groups, lawyers and government officials that united to save them. I didn't interview Michael Vick for this book because to me the story was more about what happened afterwards, which was an amazing thing, says Gorant. He said that workers need to be rewarded for their role in stabilizing the company and building its new models. These payouts recognize the continual support and tireless efforts of our people, he said.
